channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:32 Return the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 09:32 Return the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:27 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 09:27 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
